Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product, valued at $12,000 to you, offers unparalleled performance and quality. Considering its exceptional value, I am offering it to you for $10,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive price. Please let me know if this offer meets your requirements. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
